Welcome to Tafuta

Tafuta is a platform that helps people find their lost items. We connect people who have lost items with those who have found items.

If you have lost an item, click on the report button to report the item.

Report

Our Process

Click on the report button to report an item that you have lost or found.

Fill in the details of the item that you have lost or found.

Click on the list button to view items that have been reported as lost or found.

About Us

We are a team of developers who have come together to create a platform that helps people find their lost items.
